title: Middle East Crisis: At Least 25 Reported Killed in Israeli Airstrike in Southern Gaza
content: Gaza health authorities said dozens more were injured, many critically. Israel said that it was targeting a Hamas member who had taken part in the Oct. 7 attacks and that it was investigating reports of civilian casualties.

title: Israel’s Holocaust Memorial Is Stepping Up Efforts to Preserve Memories

title: A Children’s Hospital in Ukraine Becomes a Scene of Destruction
